trans-unit.source: This dialog is normally used by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref> to edit rule sets.
trans-unit.target: Essa caixa de diálogo normalmente é usada pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"> </xref> para editar conjuntos de regras.

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to use a rule set outside of this activity (for example, edit a rule set for use outside of a workflow), you can use this dialog to perform the editing of the rule set.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se você deseja usar uma regra definida fora desta atividade (por exemplo, editar uma regra definida para uso fora de um fluxo de trabalho), você pode usar essa caixa de diálogo para executar a edição de conjunto de regras.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that this <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet> is executed against.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> que este <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>é executada em.</xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: Typically it is the workflow (as used by <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"></xref>), but it can be any valid activity.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente é o fluxo de trabalho (conforme usado por <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.PolicyActivity"> </xref>), mas pode ser qualquer atividade válida.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>a ser exibido.</xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object that this condition is executed against.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto que essa condição é executada em.

trans-unit.source: Normally it is the workflow, but can be any valid type.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente ele é o fluxo de trabalho, mas pode ser qualquer tipo válido.

trans-unit.source: An optional <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"></xref> implementation that is used to determine what <xref uid="langword_csharp_Types" name="Types" href=""></xref> are available in the condition.
trans-unit.target: Um recurso opcional <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ITypeProvider"> </xref> implementação que é usada para determinar o que <xref uid="langword_csharp_Types" name="Types" href=""> </xref> estão disponíveis na condição.

trans-unit.source: If one is not specified, only types in the assembly specified by `activityType` and any assemblies it references are available.
trans-unit.target: Se um não for especificado, somente tipos no assembly especificado por `activityType` e todos os assemblies que faz referência a ele estão disponíveis.

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Inicial <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>a ser exibido.</xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Design.RuleSetDialog"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the Win32 message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passado por referência que representa o Win32 mensagem ao processo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the keystroke was processed and accessed by the control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow further processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o pressionamento de tecla foi processado e acessado pelo controle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para permitir o processamento adicional.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet> as confirmed by the dialog box user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>como confirmado pelo usuário de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet> as confirmed by the dialog box user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>como confirmado pelo usuário de caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Workflow.Activies.Rules.RuleSet>
